verses.verse: In my distress, <WH6869> I cried <WH7121> to Yahweh. <WH3068> He answered me. <WH6030>
Deliver <WH5337> my soul, <WH5315> Yahweh, <WH3068> from lying <WH8267> lips, <WH8193> from a deceitful <WH7423> tongue. <WH3956>
What will be given <WH5414> to you, <WH3254> and what will be done more to you, <WH7423> you deceitful tongue? <WH3956>
Sharp <WH8150> arrows <WH2671> of the mighty, <WH1368> with coals <WH1513> of juniper. <WH7574>
Woe <WH190> is me, <WH1481> that I live in Meshech, <WH4902> that I dwell <WH7931> among the tents <WH168> of Kedar! <WH6938>
My soul <WH5315> has had her dwelling <WH7931> too long <WH7227> with him who hates <WH8130> peace. <WH7965>
I am for peace, <WH7965> but when I speak, <WH1696> they are for war. <WH4421>
